faqs.question: Does the HRMS account for deductions like absences, lateness, taxes, and other bills in payroll?
faqs.answer: Yes, our HRMS system automatically calculates all deductions including absences, lateness penalties, taxes, and other configured deductions during payroll processing.

faqs.question: What are all the things I can do with Tafuri HR payroll?
faqs.answer: With Tafuri HR payroll, you can process monthly salaries, manage tax deductions, handle overtime calculations, generate payslips, manage bonuses, process final settlements, and generate comprehensive payroll reports.

faqs.question: Can I run payroll from a mobile phone or tablet?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tafuri HR is fully responsive and mobile-optimized. You can run payroll processes from any mobile device or tablet with internet connectivity.

faqs.question: Can I add earning and deduction in payrun?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can add additional earnings and deductions during payroll processing. The system allows you to modify individual employee payroll before finalizing the payrun.

faqs.question: Can I customize earning and deduction during Final Settlement?
faqs.answer: Yes, during final settlement processing, you have full control to customize earnings and deductions specific to that employee"s final settlement calculation.
